meanings.definition: Assigned to a category or group
meanings.sent1: The labelled boxes were all stacked neatly in the corner.
meanings.sent2: The labelled folders helped us organize our work efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The labelled cookies in the jar mysteriously disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her labelled backpack was a beacon of color in the sea of black bags.
meanings.sent5: The labelled map guided us through the winding forest trails.

meanings.definition: Described or identified with a label
meanings.sent1: The labelled jars on the shelf made it easy to find the spices.
meanings.sent2: The labelled sections in the store made shopping a breeze.
meanings.sent3: The labelled books on the shelf whispered stories of adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her labelled drawings brought life to the blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: The labelled ingredients in the recipe ensured a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: Marked with a label or tag
meanings.sent1: The labelled clothing items were on sale at the store.
meanings.sent2: The labelled boxes in the warehouse were ready for shipping.
meanings.sent3: The labelled plants in the garden bloomed beautifully in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her labelled luggage stood out among the sea of plain bags.
meanings.sent5: The labelled products on the shelves caught the customers' attention.
